languages.text: {n}Маражай тонко усмехается.{/n} "Сейчас Азуриани встанет на задние лапки и начнет скакать перед мон-кай. Не зря я зашел сюда на шум, не зря..."
{n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай тонко усмехается.{/n} "Сейчас Азуриани встанет на задние лапки и начнет скакать перед мон-кай. Не зря я зашел сюда на шум, не зря..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives a subtle laugh.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will leap on her hind legs in front of the mon-keigh. I'm glad I ended up dropping by to see what all the noise is about..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives a subtle laugh.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will leap on her hind legs in front of the mon-keigh. I'm glad I ended up dropping by to see what all the noise is about..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋幸灾乐祸地大笑起来。{/n}“好啊，轮到方舟灵族给猴子卑躬屈膝地道歉了。幸好我决定过来看看到底发生了什么事情……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋幸灾乐祸地大笑起来。{/n}“好啊，轮到方舟灵族给猴子卑躬屈膝地道歉了。幸好我决定过来看看到底发生了什么事情……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ríe despreocupadamente.{/n} «Y ahora la asuryani caminará sobre las patas traseras para diversión de los mon-keigh. Cuánto me alegro de haberme dejado caer para ver a qué venía tanto alboroto...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ríe despreocupadamente.{/n} «Y ahora la asuryani caminará sobre las patas traseras para diversión de los mon-keigh. Cuánto me alegro de haberme dejado caer para ver a qué venía tanto alboroto...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate de rire.{/n} « Et maintenant, l'Asuryani va donner la patte {mf|au|à la} mon-keigh. Je suis vraiment ravi d'être venu assister à ce spectacle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate de rire.{/n} « Et maintenant, l'Asuryani va donner la patte {mf|au|à la} mon-keigh. Je suis vraiment ravi d'être venu assister à ce spectacle. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht unbekümmert.{/n} "Und jetzt geht die Asuryani vor {mf|dem|der} Chem-Pan-Sey auf ihren Hinterbeinen. Ich bin froh, dass ich vorbeigeschaut habe, um mir den Trubel anzusehen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht unbekümmert.{/n} "Und jetzt geht die Asuryani vor {mf|dem|der} Chem-Pan-Sey auf ihren Hinterbeinen. Ich bin froh, dass ich vorbeigeschaut habe, um mir den Trubel anzusehen ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは軽快に笑う。{/n}「そして今、アシュリヤーニはモン＝ケイの前を二足歩行で歩くのだろう。立ち寄ってこの大騒ぎが何だったのか、見れてよかったよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは軽快に笑う。{/n}「そして今、アシュリヤーニはモン＝ケイの前を二足歩行で歩くのだろう。立ち寄ってこの大騒ぎが何だったのか、見れてよかったよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai arsızca gülüyor.{/n} "Şimdi Asuryani, mon-keighler önünde arka ayaklarıyla yürüyecek. Çıkardığınız bu yaygaraya ayırdığım vakte öyle değdi ki anlatamam..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs airily.{/n} "And now the Asuryani will walk on her hind legs before the mon-keigh. I am glad I decided to drop by to see what all the fuss was about..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai arsızca gülüyor.{/n} "Şimdi Asuryani, mon-keigh'nin önünde arka ayaklarıyla yürüyecek. Neden bu kadar yaygara çıktığını anlamak için iyi ki uğramışım..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
